description:
Technical stretch trousers for ski touring and mountaineering from autumn to early spring. Their
hybrid design combines three different stretch fabrics for the perfect balance of ventilation, movability
and protection. Zippers along the thighs let out excess heat. Reinforced adjustable leg endings. The
articulated fit gives full range of movement and integrated snow gaiters keeps snow and dirt out of
your boots. Equipped with a recco® rescue reflector.
name: Fjallraven Bergtagen Touring Trousers, Short - Mens
